Quincy.Herman McIntire House: The Herman McIntire House is a historic house at 55 Dixwell Avenue in Quincy, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story wood frame house is one of two houses built and lived in by Herman McIntire, a local realtor. This one (the other is at 21 Dixwell) is a well-preserved example of a large Shingle-style house, built in the affluent President's Hill neighborhood.
